#### [Point Blue Conservation Science](http://www.pointblue.org) has partnered with [TomKat Ranch](https://tomkatranch.org) to collect many different types of data reflecting changing conditions on the ranch. Every year, we summarize these data and provide Ranch staff with an update. {#intro}

### Current status

Update with data through 2021 is currently underway
